medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment specifying the function and status of the message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference of another message or transaction related to this message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and, when required, the time at which the message has been created as well as other dates and times relevant to the transactions, e.g. request date.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the name and address of the parties involved in the transaction, their contacts and financial institution information.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the name and address of the parties associated with the credit risk cover message.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment providing a communication number for the party identified in the NAD segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution (e.g. bank) and relevant account numbers for the parties involved, where necessary.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the amounts of the credit covers, the currency, the date, the request, the payment terms related to the credit cover.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying the credit cover.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment giving the monetary amounts of the current credit cover and one or more new credit covers.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currency of the credit cover.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the dates related to the credit cover, such as expiration date, date valid from or the order date (latest shipment date).

medi:segment.name: Credit cover details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCD, A segment specifying a request for a credit cover, a reply to that request and the reasons for the reply.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the percentage of the own risk, related to the credit cover.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms basis
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAT, A segment specifying the payment terms, as agreed between seller and buyer.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying the response to the request, in coded form.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the order number, when necessary.
